issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

[INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/24/11 08:14 e1cb22a) seems to affect 1.6 - 2.2.2, not seeing it on 2.3

1.Base UI > Views > Window events on a 1.6 or 2.2 device
2.after test loads, press back button

results: crash, pastie: http://pastie.org/1493588

notes: not crashing on 2.3 device, works as expected on 1.5.1 for all devices

{html}
fields.summary: Android: window events -  crash (nullpointerException) backing out of test

comments.body:
{html}

confirmed on RC1, galaxy tab (2.2.2) G1 (1.6) and Opies droid 2 (2.2.1)

{html}
